overview: Get ready to have some Fun, Fun, Fun! with a selection of our favourite episodes from season 2 of Ready, Steady, Wiggle! Prepare to solve a mystery with "Captain's Lost Hornpipe", practice your rhyming with "Lachy's Rhyme Time" and have fun with reading in "Emma's Reading Challenge" as well as many more fun-filled episodes! Join Anthony, Emma, Lachy and Simon as they sing, dance and play their way through the day with some of their favourite episodes. We guarantee you'll have Fun, Fun, Fun!
title: The Wiggles: Fun Fun Fun!
